image_analysis.description: A scanned document containing four pages of a deposition transcript, arranged in a two-by-two grid. The pages are numbered 81, 82, 83, and 84. The text is typed and includes timestamps, line numbers, speaker attributions, and the transcribed dialogue. The document has headers with page numbers and footers with the deposition service's name, contact information, date, and a document control number.
image_analysis.layout: Four pages displayed on a single sheet in a 2x2 grid. Page 81 is top-left, 82 is bottom-left, 83 is top-right, and 84 is bottom-right. Each page is a single column with numbered lines.
